channel.title: Skill Tab, HP
channel.description:
I'm using a PI Client, in this client the HP in the skillstab the HP doesn't work properly. say it's 10/99 if i eat.. it will still stay the same but your character will actually heal. The hp in the orbs work perfectly but just not in the skills tab.
If anyone can help please reply.
Thank you .

item.title: Skill Tab, HP
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

i don’t know much about it but check how it’s done in the orb
and then use that variable(i think) in the actual hp

Read full topic
